login.one_time_code_login: Sign in with a single-use code

verification_code.verification_code_subtitle: A text message with a four- digit verification code has been sent to your phone number
verification_code.enter_code_to_proceed: A text message with a 4 digit verification code has been sent to your phone number
verification_code.code_is_wrong: The code is incorrect, please try again
verification_code.instractions: The message “Click here to resend“ will appear Instead of “the code is on the way“ after the 30 are over seconds.
verification_code.note: The message “Click here to resend“ will appear instead of “the code is on the way“ after the 30 are over seconds.
